name: Kiwi Chaos
description:
First time Kiwi Jammers and first time game makers.

Gareth (an artist/painter) and Brogan (a composer and aspiring game developer) decided to take on a new challenge and make a game. So, why not do it in 48 hours.

The process was so enjoyable that we will continue development towards the mobile platform. The main focus being Kiwiana and being a Kiwi... literally.
